value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...And that's everything I know about
what's going on. Everything I know
about the Tempest...$k$pSo I beseech you, Heroes... Please,
lend me your strength so we can
restore this world!$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|Not interested. Sorry.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I...beg your pardon?$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|I'm no Hero. I'm just doing what I can
to survive.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|But... This world...$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|Not so fast, Dorcas... Surely Marth
doesn't expect mercenaries to work
for free. What's the pay like?$k$pI'm sure we'd be glad to help for...
let's say...30,000? A piece.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|M-my apologies... But I don't have
the money to hire you...$k$pI apologize for assuming you would
work for free. I'll find another group.
If you'll excuse—$k$p$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|Whoa, hold on just a minute.$k$pGosh, everyone, look how bad you
made Marth feel. We should do what
we can to help him!$k$pWell, I'll join you, anyway... I'm a
mercenary too, but I'll waive my fees
this time.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Th-thank you...$k$p$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|Heehee, don't look so shaken. You'd
think nobody's ever refused to help
before!$k$p$WmMPID_ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Normal,Face|Ho-hum... I shall participate as well. I
have already saved the world a
number of times. This shall be easy.$k$pBecause, after all, there's—$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|No one better than you—we've heard.
We'll just put this one on your tab,
Marth.$k$pYou're in too, right, big guy? This
Tempest is just one more threat to
your wife, after all.$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|I guess you're right... I'm in.$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|This world has been saved thanks to
your efforts. Thank you all so much.$k$pI can't say it enough... I truly
appreciate your help.$k$pIf it weren't for you, this world—$k$p$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|Gosh, Marth, you look like you're
about to cry.$k$pI had some good fights, the world's
back together, and we're all alive.
That's good enough for me!$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|Now that the world's not ending, I get
more time with my wife. All I ever
wanted.$k$p$WmMPID_ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Normal,Face|And I've proven my genius once
more by saving the world yet again...$k$pThus demonstrating my natural
superiority. I want for nothing more.$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|Well, I want money.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Wh-what? I'm sorry, but...like I said,
I can't pay you...$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|I'll take an I.O.U. But the interest rate
is brutal at 100 percent a month.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|What?! 100 percent?! That's—$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|Hehe... I'm willing to erase your debt,
if you're willing to make a small
wager.$k$pSimply call it in the air...
Heads or tails?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|A-all right...
Heads.
No, tails!$k$p
